channel.title: Pacifiers on Tools for Academic Research
channel.description: Recent content in Pacifiers on Tools for Academic Research

item.title: White Noise Generator
item.description: This is a completely free web application aimed at a wide range of industry users, aiming to provide high-quality customized white noise experience for every user.

item.title: FocusTube
item.description: Find Best Work & Study BGM ðŸŽ§ Welcome to FocusTube - the go-to platform for sharing YouTube videos perfect for focused activities. Discover a diverse range of genres, including lo-fi hip hop, electronica, jazz, and ambient sounds such as cafe noise or rain sounds. Anyone can submit their favorites, making our collection constantly growing and ever-changing.

item.title: myNoise
item.description: Discover a world of immersive and customizable soundscapes that can enhance focus, relaxation, and sleep. Choose from noise generators, nature sounds and ambient music to create your perfect audio environment. Explore our vast library of interactive sound generators and find your audio haven!

item.title: Coffitivity
item.description: a rather simple but useful coffee shop noise library; premium has more three more soundtracks; elegant UI; scientific research powered

item.title: Noizio
item.description: a handy white noise tool that stays in your Mac status bar.

item.title: Noisli
item.description: free mixing of multiple tracks (which is similar to Soundrown but with much better UI). Users can save a customized setting for later use.

item.title: Rainy Mood
item.description: rainy day rainy mood, simple but with excellent white noise; a new beautiful soundtrack each day
